_source.text: 6 As William Jennings Bryan often said "It is better to trust in the Rock of Ages, than to know the age of the rocks; it is better for one to know that he is close to the Heavenly Father, than to know how far the stars in the heavens are apart."

text: 6 As **William** **Jennings** **Bryan** often said "It **is** **better** to trust in the Rock of Ages, than to know the
age of the rocks; it **is** **better** for one to know that he is close to the Heavenly Father, than to know how far the stars in the heavens are apart."

_source.text: 4. Chad Smith is so so so so much better than John Irons (both RHCP drummers), have you heard Irons' solo career?

text: 4. **Chad** **Smith** is so so so so much **better** **than** John Irons (both RHCP drummers), have you heard Irons' solo career?

_source.text: 1. Great Britain's Stacey Kemp and David King, who performed their free skate to Beatles music far better than they did at Skate Detroit in July

text: 1. Great Britain's Stacey Kemp and **David** **King**, who performed their free skate to Beatles music far **better** **than** they did at Skate Detroit in July
